title: How to Make a Peanut Butter and Jelly Banana Dog

steps.headline: Spread a tablespoon of peanut butter on each hot dog bun.
Squirt a tablespoon of raspberry jelly on top of each bun.
Garnish the buns with raisins, if desired.
Serve.
steps.description: Place both buns on a serving plate. Serve with a glass of milk if desired. Enjoy!

text: Spread a tablespoon of peanut butter on each hot dog bun. (Or however much you so please.) Peel the two bananas.  Place one onto each bun.  Squirt a tablespoon of raspberry jelly on top of each bun. (Again, amount is up to you.) Garnish the buns with raisins, if desired.  Serve. Place both buns on a serving plate. Serve with a glass of milk if desired. Enjoy!
